entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9Â°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
